text: Yes of course! You can reapply with aelf Ventures if your project is initially unsuccessful after 3 months. It is beneficial to take any feedback provided by the aelf Ventures team. By improving your project or proposal based on the given feedback, you can then resubmit your application again one more time. Demonstrating progress and responsiveness to feedback can positively impact your chances in subsequent applications and show your commitment to developing a successful project.
title: Can I try applying with aelf ventures again if my project is unsuccessful?
